name: Attack of the Boba Vampire
description:
Attack of the Boba Vampires follows three little witches who have a big task: saving the world from the evil vampire king. His forces are stripping the world of magical power, and attacking vital stores of quality boba pearls. This is unacceptable! Will our three heroes be able to save the world from the blood sucking menace?

Controls:

Click on a witch and point to move them.

In the battle scene (where you control 3 witches):

Use the 3 buttons on the bottom to toggle the targeting mode for your selected witch. Point and click to use spells.

Made by David Ge, Laura Pei, Aech Talgat, and Justin Thein. Thanks to Outgoing Hikikomori for some of the nice atmospheric music.
